sources.title: Don’t Regulate AI Models. Regulate AI Use

evidence.snippet: This leads to a critical question for American engineers and policymakers alike: What can the U.S. actually enforce in a way that reduces real-world harm? My answer: Regulate AI use, not the underlying models.
evidence.note: The article argues for regulating the use of AI rather than the models themselves.
